                                                                    # å¼€æ”¾èƒ½åŠ›

                                                                    # ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯

                                                                    è·å–ç”¨æˆ·å¤´åƒå’Œæ˜µç§°ã€‚

                                                                    <button open-type="chooseAvatar" 	bind:chooseavatar="chooseAvatar">
  <image src="{{avatar}}" />
</button>

<form bind:submit="onSubmit">
  <input type="nickname" name="nickname" />
  <button form-type="submit">set username</button>
</form>

                                                                    Page({
  data: {
    avatar: "/static/default-avatar.jpg",
    username: ""
  },
  
  chooseAvatar(event) {
    this.setData({
      avatar: event.detail.avatarUrl
    })
  },
  
  onSubmit(event) {
    this.setData({
      username: event.detail.value.nickname
    })
  }
})

      imageUrl: "/static/shop.png" // å°é¢å›¾åƒ

  }
})

                                                                    # ç™»å½•æµç¨‹

                                                                    é€šè¿‡ wx.login å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªä¸´æ—¶æˆæƒç  codeã€‚å°†æˆæƒç å‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨è·å– tokenï¼Œå†æºå¸¦ token è¯·æ±‚ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

                                                                    Page({
  login() {
    wx.login({
      success: async ({ code }) => {
        const token = await apiLogin(code)
        wx.setStorageSync("TOKEN", token)
        
        const userInfo = await apiGetUserInfo()
        wx.setStorageSync("USER_INFO", userInfo)
      }
    })
  }
})

                                                                    # æ”¯ä»˜æµç¨‹

                                                                    æäº¤è®¢å•ï¼Œå°†è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯å‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°è®¢å•å·ã€‚å°†è®¢å•å·å‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¾—åˆ° æ”¯ä»˜å‚æ•°open in new windowã€‚ç„¶åè°ƒç”¨ wx.requestPayment ä¼ å…¥æ”¯ä»˜å‚æ•°ï¼Œå‘èµ·å¾®ä¿¡æ”¯ä»˜ ã€‚ç­‰å¾…ç”¨æˆ·æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸåï¼Œè·³è½¬åˆ°è®¢å•é¡µé¢ã€‚

                                                                    Page({
  async submitOrder() {
    // æ”¶é›†è®¢å•æ•°æ®ï¼šå•†å“ã€æ”¶ä»¶äºº
    // è·å–è®¢å•å·
    const orderCode = await apiSubmitOrder(orderForm)
    // è·å–æ”¯ä»˜å‚æ•°ï¼šæ—¶é—´æˆ³ã€æ”¯ä»˜IDã€ç­¾å
    const payParams = await apiGetPayParams(orderCode)
    // å‘èµ·å¾®ä¿¡æ”¯ä»˜
    const payInfo = await wx.requestPayment(payParams)
    if (payInfo.errMsg === "requestPayment:ok") {
      // æŸ¥è¯¢æ”¯ä»˜çŠ¶æ€
      const payStatus = await apiGetPayStatus(orderCode)
      if (payStatus.code === 200) {
        // è·³è½¬åˆ°è®¢å•é¡µé¢
        wx.redirectTo({ url: "/pages/order/order" })
      }
    }
  }
})

                                                                    # æ›´æ–°æœºåˆ¶

                                                                    App({
  onLaunch() {
    // åˆ›å»º updateManager å®ä¾‹ï¼Œç”¨äºç®¡ç†æ›´æ–°
    const updateManager = wx.getUpdateManager()
    
    // ç›‘å¬æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰çš„è¯ä¼šä¸»åŠ¨è§¦å‘ä¸‹è½½
    updateManager.onUpdateReady(() => {
      wx.showModal({
        title: "æ›´æ–°æç¤º",
        content: "æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·²ç»å‡†å¤‡å¥½ï¼Œæ˜¯å¦é‡å¯åº”ç”¨ï¼Ÿ",
        success: res => {
          if (res.confirm) {
            // å¼ºåˆ¶å°ç¨‹åºé‡å¯å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬
            updateManager.applyUpdate()
          }
        }
      })
    })
  }
})
